test_scenarios.description: Check that all items in the shopping cart belong to existing products in the product database.

test_steps.action: Run SQL query to fetch all product IDs from the shopping cart table
test_steps.expected_result: List of product IDs in the shopping cart

test_steps.action: Run SQL query to fetch all product IDs from the product table
Compare the two lists of product IDs
test_steps.expected_result: All product IDs in the shopping cart are found in the product table

data_requirements: Shopping cart data with product IDs
validation_criteria: All product IDs in the shopping cart match with product IDs in the product table

test_scenarios.description: Check the performance of the SQL query that fetches product IDs from the shopping cart and product tables.

test_steps.action: Run SQL query to fetch all product IDs from the shopping cart table and measure its execution time
test_steps.expected_result: Execution time is within acceptable limits

test_steps.action: Run SQL query to fetch all product IDs from the product table and measure its execution time
test_steps.expected_result: Execution time is within acceptable limits

data_requirements: Shopping cart data with product IDs
validation_criteria: Execution time of both SQL queries is within acceptable limits

test_scenarios.description: Check the security of the SQL query that fetches product IDs from the shopping cart and product tables.

test_steps.action: Run SQL query to fetch all product IDs from the shopping cart table with SQL injection attack
Run SQL query to fetch all product IDs from the product table with SQL injection attack

data_requirements: Shopping cart data with product IDs
